text: Companies want to collaborate
with their partners on their combined data sets
to understand their mutual customers,
accelerate research and development,
and enhance advertising and marketing experiences.
This is complex as matching data securely often
requires months of development time
and companies want to avoid sharing sensitive information.
AWS Clean Rooms helps you and your partners
to more easily and securely
match, analyze, and collaborate
on your collective data sets
without sharing or revealing underlying data.
You can create your own Clean Rooms in minutes
and securely collaborate
with any other company on the AWS Cloud.
You can restrict how your data can be queried
without writing code or loading data into a separate system.
And with flexible privacy enhancing controls
and cryptographic computing tools,
AWS Clean Rooms helps you keep data safe.
Collaborate with other companies
while protecting your data.
Get started with AWS Clean Rooms today.
